title: Help Tohu
text:
Tohu wants to enter Moscow State University, and he must pass the math exam. He does not know math, and asks you to help him. The problem is to find the sumSn= a1+ a2+ ... + anof the sequence{an}on condition∀ k ∈ℕ:a1+ 2a2+ ... + kak= (k+1) / (k+2)InputFirst line contains single integer T ≤ 20000 - the number of test cases.Each of the next T lines contains single integer 1 ≤ n ≤ 109.OutputFor each n output the valueSnwith 11 digits after the decimal point.ExampleInput:2
2
5Output:0.70833333333
0.73809523810
